name: Nonalcoholic Dirty Lemon Tonic
instructions: In the bottom of a sturdy rocks glass, add the preserved lemon, lemon wheels and sugar. Muddle until the sugar dissolves and the lemon wheels release their juices. Add the ice to the glass and top with tonic water.
Thread a skewer with a slice of preserved lemon rind, a few olives and a lemon half wheel; garnish.
